snippet.title: Guardians of the Galaxy: The Universal Weapon Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Join Star-Lord, Rocket, Groot, Gamora and Drax in an all-new mobile game-- Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy: The Universal Weapon! Jump into battle to help the Guardians recover the five pieces of The Universal Weapon before it falls into the hands of the villainous Ronan the Accuser!

Available Now!
App Store - http://bit.ly/1tMWdr9
Google Play - http://bit.ly/1wqATnq
Windows Phone - http://bit.ly/1mkO1ou
Windows Store - http://bit.ly/1mRcqab

Get more Guardians gaming updates! Like us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/guardiansofthegalaxygame.
